title: भाजपा द्वारा अवैध रूप से EVM जमा करने के रूप में, 2018 MP चुनाव का वीडियो वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: These are EVMs kept as ‘Reserve’ stationed at some Police stations, to be used as replacement for malfunctioning machines during Poll. Such machines were to be stored separately from polled EVMs. Strong room having Polled EVMs was neither opened nor was supposed to be opened. https://t.co/usco7xQpD1
